summary: The District of Bern is a district of the canton of Bern, Switzerland.
full_text:
Bern District  was an administrative district in the canton of Bern, Switzerland. It had an area of 233 km2  and a population of 237,919 .
Its capital was the city of Bern, which contains around half the population. The district consists of thirteen municipalities:
title: Bern (district)
